attributes.action: Make all unhealthy food and drinks packaging be blank,just like Cigarettes.
attributes.additional_details: I find that Smokers are being Prejudiced over other far dangerous food and drink that cause heart disease,liver failure,Diabetes,etc ,etc,Mcdonalds is a very unhealthy product that time and time again has been proven to be very unhealthy,but are allowed to advertise freely,Alcoholic drink has been proven dangerous,All sweets packaging is not blank,but is dangerous,cause of sugar levels.Surly if Smokers are targeted ,then so should other unhealthy food and drink
